title: Level 3 Case 1 - MGM Lion
material: Technology makes it easy to fabricate fake photos. However, technology also makes it easy to find a fake photo! This is called reverse search, you can try it out by accessing images.google.com from your desktop.
comment: Search the image and see what others say.
